pages.text: The Brazier is an essential tool for $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curses$(). other than that, it can be used for $(l:bewitchment:tools/brazier#incense)Incense$().$(br2)A Brazier can take up to four items. To start using it, you need to light it using a Flint and Steel.
For convenience, Braziers can also be attached to ceilings.

pages.title: Incenses
pages.text: Incenses are a simple usage method of the brazier. Incense can apply extended status effects after waking up.$(br2)Simply light a nearby brazier with the needed ingredients and go to sleep.
The Mortal Coil Incense is used for rather profane rites.$(br2)$(o)You may not want to prepare this before going to bed$().
